main.name: José Ramón Martínez Riveiro
main.description: Software Engineer. Bachelor and Master Degree in Computer Science
main.bio: Interested in cloud computing, software architecture and web/mobile development. My goals are to improve my skills through continuous learning, keeping up to date with new technologies and best software development practices.

education.description: English Bilingual. Software Engineering Mention. Final Bachelor Degree Project mark: 10 (with honors)

work.title: Analyst programmer

work.title: Substitute teacher

work.title: Research Fellow | Software Engineering
work.description: Designed and implemented a content manager web app for the European project LanGuide. Designed and implemented a software system (two hybrid mobile applications and a serverless cloud backend) to improve the quality of life of breast cancer patients.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Implemented a web app for monitoring based on domestic sensors. Technologies: Angular 9, Amazon Cognito, Git.
